title: Vapor pressure - acetone in 2 containers at same T

content.prompt: The figure above shows two closed containers. Each contains the same volume of acetone in equilibrium with its vapor at the same temperature. The vapor pressure of the acetone is

choices.label: higher in container 1 because the surface area of the liquid is greater
lower in container 1 because the level of the liquid is lower
the same in both containers because the volume of the liquid is the same
the same in both containers because the temperature is the same

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
